long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UltraWide Video Optimizer

Elevate your Disney+ viewing experience on ultrawide monitors with UltraWide Video Optimizer! This extension is meticulously crafted to enhance your screen's real estate, ensuring your favorite Disney+ content fits perfectly without black bars or awkward cropping.

Features:
- Customizable Zoom: Effortlessly adjust the zoom level of Disney+ videos to seamlessly fill your ultrawide screen, accommodating various aspect ratios like 21:9, 32:9, and more.
- Precise Positioning: Fine-tune the horizontal and vertical positioning of your videos to achieve the ideal viewing experience. Adjust for perfect centering or shift the video to your preferred position.
- Aspect Ratio Adjustment: Transform older movies and shows into a widescreen experience. Adjust the aspect ratio, zoom in, and reposition the video to fill your ultrawide display beautifully.
- Noir Mode: Add a classic black-and-white film effect to your Disney+ videos with Noir Mode, perfect for a nostalgic or artistic viewing experience.
- User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a simple, intuitive control panel that allows you to make real-time adjustments without interrupting your viewing experience.
- Multi-Language Support: Access the extension's features in your preferred language with support for 50 languages, ensuring a seamless experience for users worldwide.
- Smooth Performance: Experience smooth, responsive adjustments without any lag, ensuring uninterrupted enjoyment of your favorite shows and movies.

How to Use:
- Install UltraWide Video Optimizer from the Chrome Web Store.
- Open Disney+ and start watching your favorite content.
- Click the UltraWide Video Optimizer icon in your browser toolbar to access the popup.
- Use the aspect ratio and zoom sliders to adjust older movies and shows, creating a widescreen experience.
- Utilize the horizontal and vertical sliders or input fields to perfectly position the video.

Note: UltraWide Video Optimizer is exclusively designed for Disney+ content, providing the best viewing experience on ultrawide monitors.

Enhance your Disney+ viewing experience today with UltraWide Video Optimizer and enjoy every detail on your ultrawide display!

Changelog:
Version 2.6:
- New Feature: Added support for 50 languages to enhance the accessibility and user experience for a global audience.
- Improvements: Updated the extension to ensure all interface elements are translated based on the user's browser language settings.
- Bug Fixes: Resolved minor issues and improved the stability of the extension.

Version 2.5:
- Unique CSS Classes: All elements have been assigned unique CSS classes to ensure compatibility and prevent unintended modifications to default elements.
- Button Styling Enhancements: Improved the styling of the "Noir Mode" and "Auto Center" buttons for better user experience.

Version 2.4:
- Gradient Title: Added a gradient effect to the title in the popup for a more visually appealing interface.
- Bug Fixes: Resolved issues where the video controls were not covering the full height in fullscreen mode.

Version 2.3:
- Modified span CSS to eliminate the green color effect on the title font when viewing a video.
